body.p: Gov Bramlett Hon sir after my respects to you I take the opertunity to inform you that I have lost boath of my commissions as second & first Lt of co J 1 Ky cav they were captured by the enemy on the Stoneman raid I was commissioned as Second Lt July the 4th 18623 and as first Lt June the 30th 1864 please Send me a copp copy of the two commissions & confer a favor on your friend and humble servt

Lt Alexander. C. Smith
Co J 1 Ky cav

Silas Adams
Col Com 1st Ky Cav
Lieut O M Dodson, a a

Smith A. C.
Lt. Co. "J" 1st Ky. Cav.
Desires duplicates of his Comn as 2nd and 1st Lt. of Co. "J." 1st Ky. C. the originals were lost.

Issue duplicates
D W Lindsey
Inspt & adjt Genl
duplicates issued & forwd. Sept 6h 1864
Recd A. G. O. 6th Sept. 1864.
